capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall makes a great Vice-President of Hogwarts. She's an excellent educator and leader, and I'm sure she'll do a fantastic job in that role.

I think McGonagall is doing a fantastic job as the Vice-President of Hogwarts. I mean, she's an amazing witch and an incredible educator, always putting the needs of her students first. Her no-nonsense approach can be intimidating at times, but it's clear that she genuinely cares about each and every one of them.
